   19: %%
   20: -module(timetrap_1_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -compile(export_all).
   23: 
   24: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   25: 
   26: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   27: %% Function: suite() -> Info
   28: %% Info = [tuple()]
   29: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   30: suite() ->
   31:     [{timetrap,{seconds,1}}].
   32: 
   33: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   34: %% Function: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
   35: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   36: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   37: %% Reason = term()
   38: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   39: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   40:     TabPid = spawn(fun() ->
   41: 			   ets:new(?MODULE, [named_table, set, public]),
   42: 			   ets:insert(?MODULE, {last_case,ok}),
   43: 			   receive _ -> ok end
   44: 		   end),
   45:     [{tab,TabPid} | Config].
   46: 
   47: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   48: %% Function: end_per_suite(Config0) -> void() | {save_config,Config1}
   49: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   50: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   51: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   52:     exit(?config(tab, Config), kill),
   53:     ok.
   54: 
   55: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   56: %% Function: init_per_group(GroupName, Config0) ->
   57: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   58: %% GroupName = atom()
   59: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   60: %% Reason = term()
   61: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   62: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   63:     Config.
   64: 
   65: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   66: %% Function: end_per_group(GroupName, Config0) ->
   67: %%               void() | {save_config,Config1}
   68: %% GroupName = atom()
   69: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   70: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   71: end_per_group(_GroupName, _Config) ->
   72:     ok.
   73: 
   74: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   75: %% Function: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config0) ->
   76: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   77: %% TestCase = atom()
   78: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   79: %% Reason = term()
   80: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   81: init_per_testcase(TC, Config) ->
   82:     {_,_} = process_info(?config(tab, Config), priority),
   83:     [{_,ok}] = ets:lookup(?MODULE, last_case),
   84:     ets:insert(?MODULE, {last_case,fail}),
   85:     init_per_testcase1(TC, Config).
   86: 
   87: init_per_testcase1(tc4, Config) ->
   88:     [{tc,tc4},{default_timeout,5000}|Config];
   89: 
   90: init_per_testcase1(TC, Config) ->
   91:     [{tc,TC}|Config].
   92: 
   93: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   94: %% Function: end_per_testcase(TestCase, Config0) ->
   95: %%               void() | {save_config,Config1}
   96: %% TestCase = atom()
   97: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   98: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   99: end_per_testcase(TC, Config) ->
  100:     {_,_} = process_info(?config(tab, Config), priority),
  101:     [{_,fail}] = ets:lookup(?MODULE, last_case),
  102:     ets:insert(?MODULE, {last_case,ok}),
  103:     end_per_testcase1(TC, Config).
  104: 
  105: end_per_testcase1(tc1, Config) ->
  106:     ct:pal("end_per_testcase(tc1): ~p", [Config]),
  107:     tc1 = ?config(tc, Config),
  108:     {failed,timetrap_timeout} = ?config(tc_status, Config),
  109:     ok;
  110: 
  111: end_per_testcase1(tc2, Config) ->
  112:     ct:pal("end_per_testcase(tc2): ~p", [Config]),
  113:     tc2 = ?config(tc, Config),
  114:     {failed,timetrap_timeout} = ?config(tc_status, Config),
  115:     ct:sleep(2000);
  116: 
  117: end_per_testcase1(tc3, Config) ->
  118:     ct:pal("end_per_testcase(tc3): ~p", [Config]),
  119:     tc3 = ?config(tc, Config),
  120:     {failed,{testcase_aborted,testing_end_conf}} = ?config(tc_status, Config),
  121:     ok;
  122: 
  123: end_per_testcase1(tc4, Config) ->
  124:     ct:pal("end_per_testcase(tc4): ~p", [Config]),
  125:     tc4 = ?config(tc, Config),
  126:     {failed,{testcase_aborted,testing_end_conf}} = ?config(tc_status, Config),
  127:     ct:sleep(2000);
  128: 
  129: end_per_testcase1(tc5, Config) ->
  130:     ct:pal("end_per_testcase(tc5): ~p", [Config]),
  131:     tc5 = ?config(tc, Config),
  132:     exit(end_per_tc_fail_after_timeout);
  133: 
  134: end_per_testcase1(tc6, Config) ->
  135:     ct:pal("end_per_testcase(tc6): ~p", [Config]),
  136:     tc6 = ?config(tc, Config),
  137:     exit(end_per_tc_fail_after_abort);
  138: 
  139: end_per_testcase1(tc7, Config) ->
  140:     ct:pal("end_per_testcase(tc7): ~p", [Config]),
  141:     tc7 = ?config(tc, Config),
  142:     {failed,timetrap_timeout} = ?config(tc_status, Config),
  143:     ok;
  144: 
  145: end_per_testcase1(tc8, Config) ->
  146:     ct:pal("end_per_testcase(tc8): ~p", [Config]),
  147:     tc8 = ?config(tc, Config),
  148:     {failed,timetrap_timeout} = ?config(tc_status, Config),
  149:     ok;
  150: 
  151: end_per_testcase1(tc9, Config) ->
  152:     ct:pal("end_per_testcase(tc9): ~p", [Config]),
  153:     tc9 = ?config(tc, Config),
  154:     %% check that it's possible to send and receive synchronously
  155:     %% with the group leader process for end_per_testcase
  156:     test_server:stop_node(dummy@somehost),
  157:     ok.
  158: 
  159: 
  160: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  161: %% Function: groups() -> [Group]
  162: %% Group = {GroupName,Properties,GroupsAndTestCases}
  163: %% GroupName = atom()
  164: %% Properties = [parallel | sequence | Shuffle | {RepeatType,N}]
  165: %% GroupsAndTestCases = [Group | {group,GroupName} | TestCase]
  166: %% TestCase = atom()
  167: %% Shuffle = shuffle | {shuffle,{integer(),integer(),integer()}}
  168: %% RepeatType = repeat | repeat_until_all_ok | repeat_until_all_fail |
  169: %%              repeat_until_any_ok | repeat_until_any_fail
  170: %% N = integer() | forever
  171: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  172: groups() ->
  173:     [].
  174: 
  175: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  176: %% Function: all() -> GroupsAndTestCases | {skip,Reason}
  177: %% GroupsAndTestCases = [{group,GroupName} | TestCase]
  178: %% GroupName = atom()
  179: %% TestCase = atom()
  180: %% Reason = term()
  181: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  182: all() ->
  183:     [tc1, tc2, tc3, tc4, tc5, tc6, tc7, tc8, tc9].
  184: 
  185: tc1(_) ->
  186:     ct:sleep(2000),
  187:     ok.
  188: 
  189: tc2(_) ->
  190:     ct:sleep(2000).
  191: 
  192: tc3(_) ->
  193:     spawn(ct, abort_current_testcase, [testing_end_conf]),
  194:     ct:sleep(2000),
  195:     ok.
  196: 
  197: tc4(_) ->
  198:     spawn(ct, abort_current_testcase, [testing_end_conf]),
  199:     ct:sleep(2000),
  200:     ok.
  201: 
  202: tc5(_) ->
  203:     ct:sleep(2000),
  204:     ok.
  205: 
  206: tc6(_) ->
  207:     spawn(ct, abort_current_testcase, [testing_end_conf]),
  208:     ct:sleep(2000).
  209: 
  210: tc7(_) ->
  211:     sleep(2000),
  212:     ok.
  213: 
  214: tc8(_) ->
  215:     timetrap_helper:sleep(2000),
  216:     ok.
  217: 
  218: tc9(_) ->
  219:     sleep(2000),
  220:     ok.
  221: 
  222: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  223: sleep(T) ->
  224:     ct:sleep(T),
  225:     ok.
